name: @deep-ai-kr/dev-mcp
description: Browse directories and read files within a safe, configurable root. Pull accurate context from local projects and docs without leaving your workflow. Limit access to a chosen root to keep your environment secure.

tools.name: read_text_file
tools.description: Read a text file from the filesystem. Returns the file content as text.

head.description: If provided, returns only the first N lines

path.description: Path to the file to read (relative to root)

tail.description: If provided, returns only the last N lines

tools.name: write_file
tools.description: Write content to a file. Creates the file if it doesn't exist, overwrites if it does.

path.description: Path to the file to write (relative to root)

content.description: Content to write to the file

tools.name: list_directory
tools.description: List files and directories in a specified path

path.description: Path to the directory to list (relative to root)

tools.name: create_directory
tools.description: Create a directory. Creates parent directories if they don't exist.

path.description: Path to the directory to create (relative to root)

tools.name: get_file_info
tools.description: Get detailed information about a file or directory (size, permissions, timestamps, etc.)

path.description: Path to the file or directory (relative to root)

tools.name: move_file
tools.description: Move or rename a file or directory

tools.name: search_files
tools.description: Recursively search for files and directories matching a pattern

path.description: Directory to search in (relative to root)
